TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 、 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , and events of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类在 、 、和方法中使用， 以提供对传递给控件的、、 和 方法 的输入参数的访问。The class is used in the , , , and methods to provide access to input parameters that are passed to the , , , and methods of the control. 使用属性访问这些参数 。These parameters are accessed using the property. 通过添加委托来处理 、 、 或 事件，可以检查和操作参数的值，并执行所需的任何其他预处理。By adding a delegate to handle the , , , or event, you can examine and manipulate the values of the parameters and perform any additional preprocessing that is required. 对此字典中的参数所做的任何更改都将影响为该操作调用的方法重载。Any changes to the parameters in this dictionary will affect which method overload is called for the operation. 如果 设置了控件的属性 ，则只能修改此字典中项的数据对象属性，而不能添加或移除参数。When the property of the control is set, you can only modify the data object properties for the items in this dictionary; you cannot add or remove parameters. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 控件公开了许多事件，您可以处理这些事件，以便在其生命周期中的不同时间使用基础业务对象。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its life cycle. 下表列出了事件和关联的 类以及事件处理程序委托。The following table lists the events and associated classes and event handler delegates. |事件Event|`EventArgs` 类`EventArgs` class|EventHandler 委托EventHandler delegate| |-----------|-----------------------|---------------------------| |..

在创建业务对象的实例之前立即发生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |..

在创建业务对象的实例之后立即发生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |..

在检索数据之前发生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

在执行插入、更新或删除操作之前发生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |..

在检索数据后发生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

完成插入、更新或删除操作后发生。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |..

在销毁业务对象之前发生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和控件结合使用 来插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用的中间层业务对象示例。The second code example provides an example middle-tier business object that is used by the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和控件结合使用 来插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初显示一个新 `NorthwindEmployee` 记录以及自动生成的 "**插入**" 按钮。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 将数据输入到控件的字段中后 ，单击 " **插入** " 按钮，该 属性将确定执行该操作的方法 。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button, and the property will identify which method performs the action. 在此示例中， `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法用于执行插入; 但是，它需要一个 `NorthwindEmployee` 参数来插入数据。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因，控件自动传递的字符串集合 是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委托是 处理 事件并使你能够在操作继续之前操作输入参数的对象 。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 由于 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法需要 `NorthwindEmployee` 对象作为参数，因此使用字符串集合创建一个对象，并将其添加到 集合中。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象示例。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 下面的列表描述了代码示例中定义的两个主要类：The following list describes the two major classes that are defined in the code example: - `EmployeeLogic`类，该类是封装业务逻辑的无状态类。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`类，该类是一个模型类，其中只包含从数据层加载和保存数据所需的基本功能。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 此外，还提供了一个 `NorthwindDataException` 方便的类。In addition, a `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 这组示例类使用 Northwind 商贸数据库，这是一个可用于 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access 的示例数据库。This set of example classes uses the Northwind Traders database, which is an example database available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 若要获取完整的工作示例，请使用这些类，方法是将它们放在应用程序根目录下的 App_Code 目录中，或者通过编译它们并将生成的 DLL 放入 Bin 目录中。For a complete working example, use these classes by placing them in the App_Code directory under the application root or by compiling them and placing the resulting DLL in the Bin directory. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全实现，因此当您试验此示例时，不会将数据插入 Northwind 商贸数据库中。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取包含业务对象方法参数及其值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains business object method parameters and their values.

value.span: 表示业务对象方法参数及其相应值的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent the business object method parameters and their corresponding values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过引用或值将参数传递给业务对象方法。Parameters can be passed to the business object method by reference or by value. 如果使用 对象来处理 、 、 或 事件，则可以使用属性来访问和操作这些参数 。If you use an object to handle the , , , or events, you can access and manipulate these parameters using the property. 对此字典中的参数所做的任何更改都将影响为该操作调用的方法重载。Any changes to the parameters in this dictionary will affect which method overload is called for the operation. 如果 设置了控件的属性 ，则只能修改此字典中项的数据对象属性; 您不能添加或移除参数。When the property of the control is set, you can modify only the data object properties for the items in this dictionary; you cannot add or remove parameters. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 通过引用传递的参数在对象的属性中返回 。Parameters that are passed by reference are returned in the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件、 控件和多个 控件来更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示 Northwind 雇员的姓名，而 控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a Northwind Employee, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 由于 属性包含一个对象，该 对象绑定到控件的选定值 ，因此 只有在选择了员工之后才会启用触发方法的按钮。Because the property contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the control, the button that triggers the method is only enabled after an employee is selected. 在此示例中，在 `NorthwindEmployeeUpdating` 方法之前调用方法， 以将正确的参数和值添加到 集合。In this example, the `NorthwindEmployeeUpdating` method is called before the method to add the correct parameters and values to the collection. 您可以动态添加参数和值，如所示或以声明方式。You can add the parameters and values dynamically, as demonstrated, or declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_13/CS/objds13cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_13#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_13/VB/objds13vb.aspx#1)]
